events.message: I received the headphones today, but unfortunately one ear cup is broken and there is a noticeable scratch on the frame.
The issue was categorized as Product Defect based on the customer's description of broken and scratched items.
Support agent John Smith was assigned to handle this case regarding the defective headphone components reported.
Hello, I’m John from customer support. Sorry to hear about the issue with your headphones. I’m here to help get this sorted out.
Could you please provide photos showing the broken ear cup and the scratch on the frame? This will help us process your claim faster.
Thank you. I have attached clear photos of the broken ear cup and the scratch as you requested. Please let me know the next steps.
Based on the provided photos, we will send a replacement pair of headphones at no additional cost. Please confirm your shipping address.
That sounds great, thank you! My shipping address is the same as the original order, so no changes needed.
The replacement headphones have been processed and shipped today. You will receive a tracking number shortly.
Just following up to ensure that the replacement headphones arrived in good condition and that you’re satisfied with the resolution.
Yes, the replacement arrived yesterday and everything is perfect now. Thanks for the quick support!
Thank you for confirming the resolution. We are closing this case now, but please reach out if you need further assistance.
We have sent a customer satisfaction survey to your email. We appreciate your feedback to improve our service.
